Name: Crazy Race
About the game: Crazy Race is a fast-paced arcade racing game with low poly graphics and great physics. Enjoy the dizzying ride! In the classic race, you will find 12 tracks with sharp bends and straight sections for a comfortable ride. Enjoy the classic game as well as new modes: 'City Driving' and 'Physics Drive'.
